title: 8/12/21: Cuomo Resigns, Infrastructure Passes, Media's Covid Hysteria, Rand Paul Censored, Ron DeSantis Roasted, Climate Disaster, Media Fails, Obama, and More!
description:

itunes:title: 8/12/21: Cuomo Resigns, Infrastructure Passes, Media's Covid Hysteria, Rand Paul Censored, Ron DeSantis Roasted, Climate Disaster, Media Fails, Obama, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and guest host Kyle Kulinski talk about Andrew Cuomo's resignation, bipartisan infrastructure bill, elite media's covid misinformation, YouTube censorship, Ron DeSantis's policy decisions, climate change, media covering for Cuomo, Barack Obama's legacy, and more! Next week, Saagar will be returning from vacation and co-hosting Breaking Points as usual.
